    • Method Detail

      • setupConfigurationFromContext

        protected boolean setupConfigurationFromContext(JUnitConfiguration configuration,
                                                ConfigurationContext context,
                                                Ref<PsiElement> sourceElement)
        Description copied from class: RunConfigurationProducer
        Sets up a configuration based on the specified context.
        Specified by:
        setupConfigurationFromContext in class RunConfigurationProducer<JUnitConfiguration>
        Parameters:
        configuration - a clone of the template run configuration of the specified type
        context - contains the information about a location in the source code.
        sourceElement - a reference to the source element for the run configuration (by default contains the element at caret, can be updated by the producer to point to a higher-level element in the tree).
        Returns:
        true if the context is applicable to this run configuration producer, false if the context is not applicable and the configuration should be discarded.

      • onFirstRun

        public void onFirstRun(ConfigurationFromContext configuration,
                       ConfigurationContext fromContext,
                       java.lang.Runnable performRunnable)
        Description copied from class: RunConfigurationProducer
        Called before a configuration created from context by this producer is first executed. Can be used to show additional UI for customizing the created configuration.
        Overrides:
        onFirstRun in class RunConfigurationProducer<JUnitConfiguration>
        Parameters:
        configuration - a configuration created by this producer.
        fromContext - the context
        performRunnable - the runnable that needs to be called after additional customization is complete.

      • isConfigurationFromContext

        public boolean isConfigurationFromContext(JUnitConfiguration configuration,
                                          ConfigurationContext context)
        Description copied from class: RunConfigurationProducer
        Checks if the specified configuration was created from the specified context.
        Overrides:
        isConfigurationFromContext in class AbstractJavaTestConfigurationProducer<JUnitConfiguration>
        Parameters:
        configuration - a configuration instance.
        context - contains the information about a location in the source code.
        Returns:
        true if this configuration was created from the specified context, false otherwise.
